game.shortDescription: One of the most critically-acclaimed games in history, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is back, remastered in true high-definition, featuring improved textures, physically based rendering, high-dynamic range lighting and much more.
game.shortDescriptionEn: One of the most critically-acclaimed games in history, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is back, remastered in true high-definition, featuring improved textures, physically based rendering, high-dynamic range lighting and much more.

reviewHighlights.text: 게임을 해봐야 평가할 수 있지 좀 즐기는데 어느 순간 팅기고 이후 아예 겜 실행 자체가 안됨 개발사는 고칠 의지도 없어서 스스로 검색해가면서 해결해야하는 븅신겜
장점은 그래픽이 좋아서 게임할 맛이 난다는 겁니다. 단점은 VRAM 이 안좋으면 끊기네요...
